descriptionText.attr1: The Beggars are a pirate organization attempting to dominate piracy in this region of space.
The Beggar's speciality is the ability to establish bases in new territories, thanks to some clever ship use and recruitment tactics.
Once the initial foothold is gained, the Beggars engage in extortion, smuggling, and other assorted acts of piracy.
Don't be confused, if a Beggar asks you for money, its not exactly a choice.
